original_title: Ayer te quise, mañana no sé
overview: Maria is a young writer who is trying to finish writing her first novel, however her obsession with the wrong man has led her to a stagnation in her life, which makes this work more difficult. Julia, her best friend tries to get her out of her deep depression, however both friends will cross paths with love on the way and it will make them change their mindset that love doesn't suck and only coincidences are enough to find what they have always been looking for.
title: Ayer te quise, mañana no sé
